attributes.action: No Tax Deal for Rangers FC
attributes.additional_details:
Today's Sunday Time's claims that HMRC will allow Rangers to pay their £49mil over a number of years. Why should normal businesses and people be penalised for late tax returns and not paying tax yet Rangers deliberately took part in an illegal tax avoidance scheme (EBT).
Sign this if you think they should be made to pay in full and reap what they sow.
